title: What is the result of the Armenia-Azerbaijan War? - Quora

response.answer_text: Inspired by Turkish support, Azerbaijan committed an aggression against the Armenian states. On the 7th day of war, it is apparent that Azerbaijan totally failed its plans and now suffers new territorial losses. As a result of its failure, Azerbaijan completely delegated its army commandment to the Turkish officers. Turkey involved its air forces in the war with Armenia, but now had to withdraw them after the pressure from NATO & Russia. Now there are still stationary war and increasing violence on the frontline with huge casualties on the Azerbaijani side. Lets hope that the battlefield setback would uprise an insurrection in the Azerbaijani people against the bloody corrupted regime of Alievs’ clan, thereby enabling Azerbaijan to take the path of democracy, development and peace with its Armenian neighbors.
